hypothesis_content.title: Stress Regime Dominance Spike Fade
hypothesis_content.statement: During STRESS regimes (VIX > 25, crypto volatility spike), if BTC dominance spikes > 2% in 24 hours to levels above 58%, it will fade by at least 50% of the spike within 3 days as safe-haven flows prove temporary.
hypothesis_content.rationale: During market stress, capital flees to BTC as 'digital gold,' causing sharp dominance spikes. However, these moves are often overextended as: 1) forced altcoin selling creates exaggerated dominance moves, 2) stress regimes typically don't last >3 days in crypto, 3) altcoins rebound harder post-stress. The fade captures mean reversion.

exit_conditions.take_profit: BTC dominance retraces 50% of the 24-hour spike
exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC dominance makes new high above spike level

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: BTC dominance continues rising during stress regime, holding above 58%+ for >3 days without meaningful retracement.
